message: What tools are people using for their slideshows?
I used rst2pdf with the added stylesheet: https://github.com/mitechie/sqlalchemy_pyohio2011/blob/master/src/slides.style

If you produce PDF, try presenting it with "impressive", an OpenGL presentation tool written in Python — coolest feature is that you can hit "tab" and it zooms out and displays all your slides at once, to make it easy to click and re-enter your presentation at a different slide when someone asks a question.
I made a thing, not documented, but easy to copy/paste
Impressive looks really impr... interesting! I'll have to check it out. http://impressive.sourceforge.net/
